name: Go Cowboy
description:
This is my first game that I consider as finished.

You play as a cowboy, who's object is to kill all incoming enemy cowboys.

You can move with WASD keys, aim with the mouse and shoot with Left click.

After every wave of enemies you can upgrade your weapon.

I recommend downloading the game, but if you dont want to, you can play it from the browser. If you do so, you should play it full screen :)

I used an asset pack bought from Unity Asset Store for the models. I coded everything in Playmaker, which is a VisualScripting tool for Unity. Most of the sounds are from freesound.org

Things I learned in this project:

  • making 3D animations and using inverse kinematics is harder than I thought
  • how to make a basic enemy behaviour
  • how to finish a game
  • to lower the scope even more
  • how to make a basic upgrade system
  • making GUI animations

Lots of thanks to my friend Attila, who made the musics.

Have fun and do not hesitate to tell me your opinion about this little game I made :)
